ranked_diseases.explanation: This disease is the most likely candidate as similar cases 1 and 2 also presented with focal-onset seizures and were diagnosed with this condition.
This condition is also a possibility, as seen in reference case 3, where focal-onset seizures were accompanied by focal epileptiform discharges.
Another subtype of developmental and epileptic encephalopathy that can present with focal-onset seizures, thus it is considered although there was no direct match in similar cases.
